WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION
Fellow - Boursier
Mr. Eugene Chen Taiwan Serum Vaccine Institute 130, Fu-lin Road, Shihlin Taipei, Taiwan Republic of China
The above mentioned person has, upon your recommendation, been awarded a fellowship by the World Health Organization.
he fellowship is financed from Technical Assistance funds uration, including travel time, not to exceed: twelve months
Field of study Bacteriology/ production of polio- virus vaccine and other vaccines
Date 11 December 1962
The original of the Fellowship Award has been sent direct to the fellow. Major arrangements for the fellowship are listed below. The award is subject to the rules set forth in the booklet "The Fellowship Programme of the WHO".

Dr. C.K. Chang Director Department of Health Administration Ministry of Interior, Taipei, Taiwan

Durée maximum y compris le temps nécessaire pour les voyages

Le texte original du certificat d'attribution a été envoyé direc- tement au bénéficiaire. Les principaux arrangements concernant la bourse d'études sont indiqués ci-dessous. La bourse en question est accordée sous réserve des dispositions spécifiées dans la brochure « Programme des Bourses d'études de l'OMS ».
